description:
In this newly expanded world, horrifying enemies await to challenge you! 

● New adventure regions added.
Over 150 new regions added: including cold snowfields, underwater locations, burning lava, time-transcended worlds and 60+ types of new monsters. 

● New Equipment and Occults 
New equipment, skills and Occults have been added along with new adventure regions and expanded levels.

● New Gameplus Mode 
Your journey isn't over yet.
Play the New Gameplus Mode for a deeper adventure with stronger enemies!
name: 3000th Duel: The Wise Ones
